body:
Comment 1: 
reproduced on openbsd-5.2/amd64:
--- FAIL: TestCgoCrashHandler (1.90 seconds)
        crash_test.go:78: expected "main: recovered done
new-thread: recovered done
second-new-thread: recovered done
main-again: recovered done
", but got "# command-line-arguments
/usr/bin/ld: /var/tmp/go-link-FwncUO/go.o: relocation R_X86_64_32 can not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC
/var/tmp/go-link-FwncUO/go.o: could not read symbols: Bad value
collect2: ld returned 1 exit status
/home/minux/go.hg/pkg/tool/openbsd_amd64/6l: running gcc failed: unsuccessful exit status 0x100
"
--- FAIL: TestCgoSignalDeadlock (1.65 seconds)
        crash_cgo_test.go:21: expected "OK
", but got "# command-line-arguments
/usr/bin/ld: /var/tmp/go-link-iIEXwY/go.o: relocation R_X86_64_32 can not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC
/var/tmp/go-link-iIEXwY/go.o: could not read symbols: Bad value
collect2: ld returned 1 exit status
/home/minux/go.hg/pkg/tool/openbsd_amd64/6l: running gcc failed: unsuccessful exit status 0x100
"
FAIL
FAIL    runtime 20.563s
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
